channel.title: Kernel Panic
channel.description:
Hi,
Does not mater what I try every single time I start the gateway OR/and the workstation I get a Kernel panic at the EXACT same point
[ 5.410005] Kernel panic - not syncing: Attempted to kill init! exitcode=0x00000004 [ 5.410005] [ 5.412094] CPU: 0 PID: 1 Comm: init Not tainted 3.10-3-686-pae #1 Debian 3.10.11-1
etc..
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/29n6khd.jpg[/img]

item.title: Kernel Panic
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I am wondering why pae doesn’t work for you. Maybe you have older hardware. But I would wonder, because that screenshot looked like Windows Vista, 7 or 8 and I though those are all capable of pae. Perhaps you can enable it in the BIOS. Pae would probably have better performance.

Keyboard layout:

Whonix – 9 Nov 19

Keyboard Layout - Whonix

How to change the Keyboard Layout in Whonix ™.

Read full topic

item.title: Kernel Panic
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Perhaps bit flip. Please verify Whonix:

Whonix – 31 Dec 19

FREE Whonix ™ Download for Windows, macOS, Linux and Others

FREE Download Whonix ™. Privacy Protection. Anonymity Online. For Windows, macOS, Linux.

And/or re-download Whonix. And also delete Whonix from VirtualBox and re-import Whonix into VirtualBox.

Please tell us if that helped.
